title: Understanding Prototypal Inheritance in JavaScript
excerpt: Exploring how JavaScript's prototypal inheritance works and how objects inherit properties through the prototype chain.

title: The [[Prototype]] Chain Explained
excerpt: How JavaScript looks up properties through the prototype chain until it finds the property or reaches null.

title: Creating Objects with Constructor Functions
excerpt: Understanding how constructor functions create objects with prototype linkage in JavaScript.

title: Class Syntax: Syntactic Sugar Over Prototypes
excerpt: How ES6 class syntax compiles down to prototypes and provides a more readable way to work with inheritance.

title: Object.create() for Explicit Prototype Linkage
excerpt: Using Object.create() to create objects with explicit prototype linkage and share behavior across objects.

title: Sharing Behavior Without Duplication
excerpt: How prototypal inheritance allows you to share methods across many objects without duplicating code.

title: Prototypal Inheritance in Modern Apps
excerpt: When and how to leverage prototypal inheritance for lightweight domain objects and performance-sensitive paths.

title: Prototypal vs Classical Inheritance
excerpt: Comparing prototypal inheritance with classical inheritance and understanding when to use each approach.

title: Composition Over Inheritance
excerpt: Understanding when not to use inheritance and how composition can provide more flexible solutions.
